question: Which organisation announced to ship 2 billion Covid vaccines to developing countries in 2021, as a part of COVAX initiative?
explanation:
The U.N. childrenâ€™s agency UNICEF announced that around 2 billion doses of Covid-19 vaccines will be sent to developing countries next year.
UNICEF has partnered with 350 airlines and freight companies to deliver vaccines and 1 billion syringes to poor countries, as part of COVAX initiative. Under the initiative led by GAVI vaccine group and WHO among others aims to deter hoarding Covid-19 vaccines.
